summary: REQ-25 appears implemented by adjusting the ProgressBowl canvas rendering origin to shift the bowl upward (reducing top blank space). However, two additional files (project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt) were modified even though the request constrained changes to only the ProgressBowl canvas element/behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified non-target project metadata/state file (project_state.json) despite requirement to apply changes only to ProgressBowl canvas behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrained changes to the selected element (`frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx`) and its direct canvas-rendering behavior; updating project state metadata is unrelated to removing top empty space in the canvas.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt (project documentation/summary) though not requested and outside the selected element scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not ask to update documentation/summaries; constraint says apply changes ONLY to the selected element and direct rendering behavior.
